definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

sentences.english: Internal appointments are advertised on the notice-board.
sentences.chinese: 内部职位在通告栏中公布。

sentences.english: For Reference Only, please refer to HARTS notice from time to time.
sentences.chinese: 只供参考，请密切留意本会通告。

sentences.english: Responses to the sources-sought notice are due June 6.
sentences.chinese: 对来源搜索通告的响应截止6月6日。

sentences.english: Users can donate here or by clicking on the notice on top of each page on Wikipedia.
sentences.chinese: 用户可以在此捐款或者点击维基百科页面顶端的通告。

sentences.english: A read-only list where the project does official announcements.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个发布官方通告的只读邮件列表。
已贴出通告宣布该船失踪。

sentences.english: The notice did not specify a time or location. Watch video of meteor-like fireball »
sentences.chinese: 该通告没有说明时间和地点。

sentences.english: Angry workers tore the notice down from the noticeboard.
sentences.chinese: 愤怒的工人把布告栏上的通告撕了下来。

sentences.english: There's a notice on the board saying that the meeting has been cancelled.
sentences.chinese: 布告板上的通告说会议已经取消了。

sentences.english: Operators Run to notice the fields of the GuDing.
sentences.chinese: 跑去通告地里干活的家丁们。

sentences.english: They tell you we are dreareers.
sentences.chinese: 他们通告你，我们是理想家。

sentences.english: Blood tests and ovary scans only give women a few years' advance notice.
sentences.chinese: 血液检测和卵巢扫描只能为女性提供提前几年的通告。

sentences.english: He told him that he had three days to hightail it or there'd turn into a showdown.
sentences.chinese: 艾顿通告他有三天的时间逃命，否则就是摊牌。

sentences.english: The consequences of non-cooperation are set out in the Notice of Initiation.
sentences.chinese: 不合作的后果已被在通告上。

sentences.english: Map and photos of the new bus stop have been posted on notice board of each block for reference.
sentences.chinese: 地图及相关相片已张贴于各座大堂通告板，以作参考。

sentences.english: The two companies, NYSE Euronext and Deutsche Borse, announced the agreement Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 这两个公司在周二通告了他们的一致协议。

definition: to issue (a memorandum etc) to lower levels/to distribute (e.g. disaster relief to victims)
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to transmit down (a chain of command)/to pass down (to lower level)/to issue/to send through
to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
posting on a bulletin board/notice/bulletin/to announce
to set a time limit/time limit/deadline
